name: WWF War Zone
overview: ENTER THE WAR ZONE! Over a dozen WWF Superstars: Stone Cold Steve Austin, Kane and The Undertaker, Shawn Michaels and more! 4 outrageous modes of play: Cage Match! Championship Challenge! VS. and Tag Team! In and Out of the ring action: Over 40 moves per character! Signature and finishing moves! Feuds, grudge matches and personal vendettas!
